snippet.title: My Singing Monsters  - Sneak Peek!
snippet.description:
The exclusive first look at Big Blue Bubble's latest title - My Singing Monsters. It's a world-building game where the player collects and breeds cute monsters. There’s a big difference to this game, however, that sets it far apart from others of the genre; these monsters sing, play and dance!

Each island is its own song and they are packed full of incredibly cute monsters! Keep on the lookout for My Singing Monsters and be one of the first to fall in love with this incredibly unique game!

Download the game for FREE today:
on Apple App Store: http://smarturl.it/MSM-iOS
on Google Play: http://smarturl.it/MSM-Android
on Amazon: http://smarturl.it/MSM-Amazon
on Nook: http://smarturl.it/MSM-Nook

***
STAY TUNED and Follow:
https://facebook.com/MySingingMonsters
https://twitter.com/SingingMonsters
https://plus.google.com/+MySingingMonsters
***
